chomsky.production

Class Productions

  • java.lang.Object
    • chomsky.production.Productions

  • public class Productions
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents all the productions of a chomsky grammar

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Productions()
      Create a new empty set of productions

    • Method Summary

      return true if the production t -> t1 t2 is in the productions, false otherwise

      return true if the production t -> f is in the productions, false otherwise
      java.util.Set<NonTerminal> get(NonTerminal t1, NonTerminal t2)
      Return the set of all possible left part (non terminal symbol) of the right part t1 t2
      java.util.Set<NonTerminal> get(java.util.Set<NonTerminal> nonTerminaux, java.util.Set<NonTerminal> nonTerminaux2)
      Return the set of all possible left part (non terminal symbol) of all the right part of the two set

      Return the set of all possible left part (non terminal symbol) of all the right part of the set symbol
